rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living area.
rooms.vastu_note: Adjacent to the kitchen and living room enhances family interaction.

rooms.vastu_note: Placed in a quiet corner ensuring minimal disturbances.

rooms.vastu_note: Adjacent to the kitchen for convenience.

rooms.description: Small guest bathroom with essential fixtures for visitors.

rooms.description: A dedicated garage space with a driveway leading from the north entrance.

openings.description: A grand entrance that welcomes family members and visitors with a Mediterranean flair.
A balcony attached to the living area providing an outdoor space and garden view.
A staircase leading to the upper floor with Mediterranean-style balustrading.
Large windows to enhance natural light and connect the interior with the garden.
Windows to ensure a peaceful and bright environment for reading.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony.

rooms.description: A large Mediterranean-inspired garden with a mix of greenery, seating areas, and an outdoor dining space.
